movies.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
movies.quote: “Meeting him across the lawn for the first time would be so ordinary. I don't want to be just introduced to him. I want it to be something strange and romantic and something I'll always remember.”

post.value: “Meeting him across the lawn for the first time would be so ordinary. I don't want to be just introduced to him. I want it to be something strange and romantic and something I'll always remember.”

movies.title: Beauty Shop
movies.quote: “30 thousand dollars?! What the hell kind of a shop can I buy with that!”

movies.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
movies.quote: “Papa, it is a very sweet location and the building is fine, but there is a problem, which makes it impossible for us to open a restaurant there. There is already a restaurant.”

post.value: “Papa, it is a very sweet location and the building is fine, but there is a problem, which makes it impossible for us to open a restaurant there. There is already a restaurant.”

movies.title: Pride and Prejudice
movies.quote: “If, however, your feelings have changed, I will have to tell you: you have bewitched me, body and soul, and I love--I love--I love you. I never wish to be parted from you from this day on.”

post.value: “If, however, your feelings have changed, I will have to tell you: you have bewitched me, body and soul, and I love--I love--I love you. I never wish to be parted from you from this day on.”

movies.title: Just Go With It
movies.quote: “Mom, before we go can I make a Devlin?”

post.value: “Mom, before we go can I make a Devlin?”

movies.title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
movies.quote: “Bless your beautiful hide, wherever you may be. We ain’t met yet but I’m willin’ to bet, you’re the gal for me!”

post.value: “Bless your beautiful hide, wherever you may be. We ain’t met yet but I’m willin’ to bet, you’re the gal for me!”

movies.title: Galaxy Quest
movies.quote: “I'm not even supposed to be here. I'm just ‘Crewman Number Six.’ I'm expendable. I'm the guy in the episode who dies to prove how serious the situation is. I've gotta get outta here.”

post.value: “I'm not even supposed to be here. I'm just ‘Crewman Number Six.’ I'm expendable. I'm the guy in the episode who dies to prove how serious the situation is. I've gotta get outta here.”

movies.title: Blended
movies.quote: “He’s a bad daddy! He made me look like the walking dead!”

post.value: “He’s a bad daddy! He made me look like the walking dead!”

movies.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
movies.quote: “If you’re going to become true dodgeballers, then you’ve got to learn the five D’s of dodgeball. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and… doge.”

post.value: “If you’re going to become true dodgeballers, then you’ve got to learn the five D’s of dodgeball. Dodge, duck, dip, dive, and doge.”

movies.title: Chef
movies.quote: “I may not do everything great in my life, but I'm good at this. I manage to touch people's lives with what I do and I want to share this with you.”

post.value: “I may not do everything great in my life, but I'm good at this. I manage to touch people's lives with what I do and I want to share this with you.”
